name: Just Machine Gun
description:
Firstly designed for Android, there's a PC version now that you can download and play. Instead of earning mini dollars watching rewarded ads, you will earn them by scoring more points.

Upgrade your machine gun visiting the factory and spending your well earned mini dollars.

The game concept is easy: aim the targets with your cursor and click them to shoot at them. However, as you complete the initial levels, the game will speed up, show targets with different colours and with different behaviors that will increase significantly the difficult. Will you be able to finish the 40 levels?
